label: Flow 4 - Consent
info: Direct integration with the Social Security Administration (SSA) provides our API clients with the fastest response times in the industry for SSN verification direct from the SSA via the Form SSA89. Our 4506t API offers a secure direct connection to our homegrown IRS Direct ordering platform. Returning up to 3 past years of Tax Transcripts results as they are completed at the IRS level.

label: Flow 7 - Automated Underwriting
info: Information from a mortgage loan application (Fannie Mae form 1003) is uploaded to an automated underwriting system (AUS) which retrieves relevant data, such as a borrower's credit history, and arrives at a logic-based loan decision.

label: Flow 10 - Loan Boarding
info: Loan Boarding. Loan boarding, or the process by which a portfolio of loan and account data is transferred from one management system to another, is a critical concern when considering outsourcing to a third party.

name: Form SSA-89 (04-2017). Social Security Administration. Authorization for the Social Security Administration (SSA).
fraud check
func:
/*
* Screens borrowers and businesses 
* against the Housing and Urban Development 
* - General Services Administration 
* (HUD-GSA), Housing and Urban Development 
* - Limited Denial of Participation (HUD-LDP) 
* and other exclusionary lists to help 
* ensure investor 
* acceptance of your loan submissions.
*/
return msg;

name: Wet / Dry Funding
info: “Wet funding” and “dry funding,” which varies by state, refer to when a mortgage is considered “officially” closed, mortgage funds are dispersed and the new owner can take possession of the property.

name: Wet / Dry Closing
info: How Long After Closing Does a Mortgage Fund? Purchase mortgages fund at or within 24 hours of closing; refinances take three days. A mortgage may fund at different times, depending on the lender and the loan. Sometimes mortgage lenders wire funds the day of the closing.

name: Soft Closing
info: Closing (also referred to as completion or settlement) is the final step in executing a real estate transaction. The closing date is set during the negotiation phase, and is usually several weeks after the offer is formally accepted. On the closing date, the ownership of the property is transferred to the buyer.

name: AUW
info: Information from a mortgage loan application (Fannie Mae form 1003) is uploaded to an automated underwriting system (AUS) which retrieves relevant data, such as a borrower's credit history, and arrives at a logic-based loan decision.

name: Fannie Mae / Freddie Mac
info: During the normal processing of your loan application, your loan will probably get submitted to an AUS (automated underwriting system). There are two systems: one is Fannie Mae's DU (Desktop Underwriter — sometimes called Desktop Originator) and the other one is Freddie Mac's LP (Loan Prospector).

name: Conventional Loan
func:
/*
* DU (Desktop Underwriter) is commonly 
* used for conventional loans. Whereas, 
* LP (loan prospector) is commonly used 
* for FHA loans. They can be intermingled, 
* but ALL prime mortgages start with 
* an automated underwriting engine 
* these days.
*/
return msg;

format:
<script>
var value = "hello world";
// or overwrite value in your callback function ...
this.scope.action = function() { return value; }
</script>
<md-button ng-click="send({payload:action()})">
    Click me to send a hello world
</md-button>
